text: The upcoming "Terminator" reboot has found its Sarah Connor,...
Deadline reports that the 26-year-old actress will join Arnold Schwarzenegger...
...when he reprises his role as the killer cyborg in the 2015 summer blockbuster.
The role of Sarah Connor was originated by actress Linda Hamilton,...
...and later played by fellow "Game of Thrones" star Lena Headey...
...in the short-lived FOX action series "The Sarah Connor Chronicles".
